shortdesc.ph: Reports the transport-layer statistics of each remote audio stream.
Reports the transport-layer statistics of each remote audio stream.

dlentry.dd: This callback is deprecated, please use instead. This callback is deprecated, please use instead.

section.p: This callback reports the transport-layer statistics, such as the packet loss rate and network time delay, once every two seconds after the local user receives an audio packet from a remote user. This callback reports the transport-layer statistics, such as the packet loss rate and network time delay, once every two seconds after the local user receives an audio packet from a remote user. During a call, when the user receives the video packet sent by the remote user/host, the callback is triggered every 2 seconds. During a call, when the user receives the audio data packet sent by the remote user/host, the callback will be triggered every 2 seconds.

plentry.pd: The ID of the remote user sending the audio streams. The ID of the remote user sending the audio streams.
The network delay (ms) from the sender to the receiver. The network delay (ms) from the sender to the receiver.
Packet loss rate (%) of the audio packet sent from the sender to the receiver. Packet loss rate (%) of the audio packet sent from the sender to the receiver.
Bitrate of the received audio (Kbps). Bitrate of the received audio (Kbps).
